ActCanada Consumer Product Safety Act
SubjectPlaypens Regulations
PrecisPLAYPENS REGULATIONS in order to help increase playpen safety by aligning the majority of the Canadian requirements with the American mandatory rules, and aligning some others with the current Cribs, Cradles and Bassinets Regulations.
